name: monolog/monolog
description: Sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services
_: phpunit/phpunit-mock-objects required in 2.3.0 due to https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit-mock-objects/issues/223 - needs hhvm 3.8+ on travis

suggest.graylog2/gelf-php: Allow sending log messages to a GrayLog2 server
suggest.ruflin/elastica: Allow sending log messages to an Elastic Search server
suggest.ext-mongo: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server via PHP Driver
suggest.php-console/php-console: Allow sending log messages to Google Chrome
